jobDescription: Data ScientistThe Role Future Finance is looking for an experienced data scientist to join our growing teamm in Chicago. As a key contributor in our data-driven lending business, you will be responsible for supporting our risk management, operations, capital markets, and marketing functions with insights gained from data-mining internal and external data. The ideal candidate is adept at using large data sets to find opportunities for risk management and process optimization, and at using models to test the effectiveness of different consumer lending strategies. Candidates must have strong experience using a variety of data mining and data analysis methods; using a variety of data tools; building and implementing models;using and creating algorithms; and creating and running simulations.
